New Records: Sacramento Kings had three 20-point scorers; Domantas Sabonis recorded a career-high 28 rebounds
Key Match Events: Celtics struggled in the fourth quarter with a 14.3% three-point shooting rate while Kings shot 72.7%
Turnig point was the Kings' strong performance in the fourth quarter leading to the win
Pre-Game Insights: Celtics aware of Kings' hot streak; focused on improving defense and offense efficiency
Post-Match Reflections: Jayson Tatum emphasized not using the trap-game loss as an excuse; Joe Mazzulla highlighted the need for offensive consistency; Jaylen Brown and Kristaps Porzingis expressed confidence in the team's ability to bounce back
Miscellaneous Highlights: Celtics' main core playing together only a few times this season affecting their performance
